snippet: Employees at Dover Street Market are not models for the store’s clothing; they have their own distinctive styles.
abstract: Employees at Dover Street Market are not models for store’s clothing, instead showcasing their own distinctive styles; their strong sense of fashion and dedication to customer service help make store, which is owned by Commes des Garcons, one of New York's most esoteric and inspiring shopping experiences.
lead_paragraph: Employees at Dover Street Market are not models for the store’s clothing; they have their own distinctive styles.

headline.seo: At Dover Street Market, the Sales Staff Is Encouraged to Show Off Their Personal Style
headline.main: Now Turning Heads: The Sales Staff
headline.print_headline: Now Turning Heads: The Sales Staff
